topic.title: Site requests
topic.body: Post here (as comment) your request for the site you want to index.

topic.title: Page requests
topic.body:
Post here (as comment) your request for the page of a site you want to index.

Tell the site Title, URL and Tags.

topic.title: Removal requests
topic.body: Some site is going against our [Terms](/snifferdog.bit/terms)? Post here.
